"Wellness Comes in Waves"

Service Menu  Book now

## About Us

Experience the healing of Crystal Coast Massage and Wellness and emerge back
into the world calm and invigorated.  
  

Re-discover your sense of well-being with personalized therapies that nurture
both body and mind. Enjoy an experience that will allow you to achieve calm,
relaxation and peace inside and out. Our experienced staff of massage
therapists are able to offer you everything from the best relaxation massage
to the treatment and rehabilitation of injuries.  
  

Experience the finest treatments available in Eastern North Carolina at our
convenient and tranquil location.  

  1.   2.   3.   4.

### Client Testimonials

Here's what our clients are saying

* * *

  * Allison was a great and respectful person while doing the message. She is very professional and the atmosphere of Crystal Coast Massage and Wellness was very relaxing. I definitely was able to tell a difference just after 30 min!! 

Check this place out for peaceful atmosphere, friendly yet professional &
quiet experience.

  * Alison is amazing. She is very professional and does a great job. I feel so relaxed when I leave her table. 

Mrs. Summa's hands are anointed to provide particular care to her customers.
She has a love and compassion for people as a whole. She is very attentive to
the customer and provides a listening hear to discern exactly what the
customers needs are. Everyone is not anointed or equipped to do what she does,
even though they work in this profession. As a preacher, I would suggest all
my clergy friends to make an appointment with Mrs. Summa. Also, I am very
proud of how she stepped out into the deep to open her own business. Thank be
to God.

  * Alison is very professional and skilled. I feel like she truly wants me to be well. She is super flexible and understanding about schedules. I love her space and always leave feeling amazing! 

Very professional and helped me a lot. Had knots in lower back from an
accident. Felt 100% better walking out and even better the next day. Very good
massage. I will be back.

  * HIGHLY recommend Crystal Coast Massage and Wellness. I frequently get massages and Alison gave one of the best massages I have ever had. Normally i have to ask for more pressure but not with her! She addressed all of the areas that needed working and gave the best foot massage EVER. Look no further - this place was clean, simple and had a great atmosphere! 

Great massage experience. Atmosphere is very relaxing and worked out troubled
areas in shoulders.

  * I like heavy pressure for my deep tissue massages, and Alison was great, as always. She paid extra attention to my problem areas and afterwards had suggestions to help me. Can't wait to go back! 

Such an amazing experience. I deal with back pain and Alison does an amazing
job to soothe my pain. I can move without pain when I leave her office, I have
reoccurring appointments now. Check her out!

  * Allison was a great and respectful person while doing the message. She is very professional and the atmosphere of Crystal Coast Massage and Wellness was very relaxing. I definitely was able to tell a difference just after 30 min!! 

Check this place out for peaceful atmosphere, friendly yet professional &
quiet experience.

  * Alison is amazing. She is very professional and does a great job. I feel so relaxed when I leave her table. 

Mrs. Summa's hands are anointed to provide particular care to her customers.
She has a love and compassion for people as a whole. She is very attentive to
the customer and provides a listening hear to discern exactly what the
customers needs are. Everyone is not anointed or equipped to do what she does,
even though they work in this profession. As a preacher, I would suggest all

proud of how she stepped out into the deep to open her own business. Thank be
to God.

On one of our Membership plans?

60 Minute Deep Tissue Massage

Designed to remove severe tension, deep tissue massage is a technique used to
relieve both muscles and connective tissue below the surface. It helps to
improve range of motion and heal injuries below the surface.

$85

60min

Select

90 Minute Deep Tissue Massage

Designed to remove severe tension, deep tissue massage is a technique used to
relieve both muscles and connective tissue below the surface. It helps to
improve range of motion and heal injuries below the surface.

$130

90min

Select

60 Minute Therapeutic Massage

Therapeutic massage is a perfect combination between Swedish & Deep Tissue
techniques. Specifically tailored to go deep in certain areas while going
lighter in others to help achieve deep relaxation

$80

60min

Select

90 Minute Therapeutic Massage

Therapeutic massage is a perfect combination between Swedish & Deep Tissue
techniques. Specifically tailored to go deep in certain areas while going
lighter in others to help achieve deep relaxation

$120

60 Minute Swedish Massage

Massage oil or cream is used with smooth, gliding strokes. Swedish massage
uses firm but gentle pressure to promote relaxation, ease muscle tension and
create other health benefits. It is a classic massage that will ease your
stress and allow you to slip into a calm state of relaxation.

$75

60min

Select

90 Minute Swedish Massage

Massage oil or cream is used with smooth, gliding strokes. Swedish massage
uses firm but gentle pressure to promote relaxation, ease muscle tension and
create other health benefits. It is a classic massage that will ease your
stress and allow you to slip into a calm state of relaxation.

$110

90min

Select

30 Minute Medicupping

Massage Cupping is a modern adaptation of the ancient art of cupping therapy.
While massage performed by applying pressure, cupping instead uses negative
pressure to pull, lift, open and expand the body’s soft tissues.

$55

30min

Select

60 Minute Prenatal Massage

Pregnancy massage focuses on addressing the special needs of expecting women.
Cushions, and side-lying postures are used to prevent putting pressure on the
abdomen.

$75

60min

Select

15 Minute Chair Massage

Chair Massage is performed in a specially designed chair with your clothes on.
It is excellent for relaxation and more, depending on the technique(s) used by
your massage therapist.

$20

15min

45 Minute Crystal Healing Session

A holistic, non-invasive, vibrational energy-based system of healing performed
with clothing on. The technique uses precisely placed crystals either on
and/or around the physical body to aid in emotional, physical & mental
wellbeing. Receive a free crystal at the end of your session.

Alison S.

License: NC #003259352

37 Verified Reviews

Book Now

  * About 
  * Services 
  * Reviews 

I've been practicing massage for 7 years. I challenge myself to actively keep
learning and currently offer a variety of techniques tailored to meet each
individual's needs. From injuries and rehab to active stretching, I can work
with your body to get you feeling like you should again. You'll find me to be
friendly, respectful and professional. Specializing in Swedish, Therapeutic &
Deep Tissue massage, with certifications in Medicupping and Crystal Healing.

Alison is amazing. She is very professional and does a great job. I feel so
relaxed when I leave her table.

by  Anonymous  on Apr 16

Mrs. Summa's hands are anointed to provide particular care to her customers.
She has a love and compassion for people as a whole. She is very attentive to
the customer and provides a listening hear to discern exactly what the
customers needs are. Everyone is not anointed or equipped to do what she does,
even though they work in this profession. As a preacher, I would suggest all
my clergy friends to make an appointment with Mrs. Summa. Also, I am very
proud of how she stepped out into the deep to open her own business. Thank be
to God.

by  Alex  on Mar 22

Alison is very professional and skilled. I feel like she truly wants me to be
well. She is super flexible and understanding about schedules. I love her
space and always leave feeling amazing!

by  Wes  on Mar 02

Very professional and helped me a lot. Had knots in lower back from an
accident. Felt 100% better walking out and even better the next day. Very good
massage. I will be back.

by  Julia  on Feb 15

HIGHLY recommend Crystal Coast Massage and Wellness. I frequently get massages
and Alison gave one of the best massages I have ever had. Normally i have to
ask for more pressure but not with her! She addressed all of the areas that
needed working and gave the best foot massage EVER. Look no further - this
place was clean, simple and had a great atmosphere!

by  Patrick  on Feb 05

Great massage experience. Atmosphere is very relaxing and worked out troubled
areas in shoulders.

always. She paid extra attention to my problem areas and afterwards had
suggestions to help me. Can't wait to go back!
